description:
A versatile tire that works just as well for commuting as it does for touring. The Adventure Tech tire is a fast an efficient tire for year round riding, the smooth centerline rolls well in all conditions, while the water clearing grooves keep you planted on those rainy rides.

  • E-bike compatible compound
  • Minimal center tread for a fast and efficient roll
  • Sidewall tread improves grip while cornering and channels water away from the contact point
  • Graphene compound balances grip and durability
  • Reflective sidewall stripe helps keep you seen
  • Puncture protection layer reduces the risk of flats
name: Vittoria Adventure Tech Tire
